snippet: Experts said too many second-rate offerings bogged down the auction of Impressionist and modern art Wednesday night in Manhattan.
abstract: Experts say second-rate offerings led to disappointing Impressionist and modern art auction at Christie's, not Hurricane Sandy, election fatigue or the uncertain economy.
lead_paragraph: Experts said too many second-rate offerings bogged down the auction of Impressionist and modern art Wednesday night in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Art Gets Blame for an Anemic Sale at Christie’s
headline.main: Art, Not Storm or Election, Is Blamed for Anemic Sale at Christie’s
headline.print_headline: Art, Not Storm or Election, Is Blamed for Anemic Sale at Christie’s
